text: (Smarana kara) jevha tumaci bahina jata hoti ani sangata hoti ki, tumhi mhanata asala tara mi tyaca patta sangu jo ya (bala) ci dekharekha thevanara banu sakela. Asa prakare amhi tumhala punha tumacya matejavala pathavile, yasathi ki tice netra sitala rahaveta ani ti duhkhi ho'u naye ani tumhi eka manasaca vadha kela hota, tya uparanta amhi tumhala duhkhapasuna vacavile, arthata amhi tumaci cangalya prakare kasoti ghetali, maga tumhi aneka varsaparyanta madayanacya lokammadhye nivasa kela, maga allahacya likhita bhagyanusara he musa tumhi ale
